TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataContractSurrogate

summary.span: 提供 在序列化、反序列化以及导出和导入 XML 架构文档 (XSD) 的过程中将一种类型替换为另一种类型所需的方法。

span.span: Provides the methods needed to substitute one type for another by the during serialization, deserialization, and export and import of XML schema documents (XSD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 时，如果需要执行以下操作之一，请使用 ：将一种类型或对象替换为另一种，或者动态生成架构变体。Use the when using the if you need to do one of the following: substitute one type or object for another, or to dynamically generate schema variations. 示例应用程序，请参阅[DataContract 代理项](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/datacontract-surrogate.md)。For a sample application, see [DataContract Surrogate](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/datacontract-surrogate.md). 有关数据协定的详细信息，请参阅[Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). 在运行时，可以查找服务中的任何操作的特定 ，方法是使用 查找 实例。At run time, you can find the specific for any operation in a service by using the to find the instance. 有关如何实现的接口来创建一个代理项的详细信息，请参阅[数据协定代理项](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md)。For more information about implementing the interface to create a surrogate, see [Data Contract Surrogates](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md). 使用 和 类时，还可以使用 来影响 XML 架构的导入和导出。You can also use the to affect the import and export of XML schemas when you are using the and classes. 可以通过将 分配给 类的 属性或 类的 属性来实现此目标。You can do so by assigning the to the property of the class, or to the property of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[架构导入和导出](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md)。For more information, see [Schema Import and Export](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示 接口的实现。The following example shows an implementation of the interface. 该代码将 `Person` 类替换为 `PersonSurrogated` 类型的序列化。The code substitutes the serialization of the `Person` type for a `PersonSurrogated` class. [!code-csharp[IDataContractSurrogate#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/idatacontractsurrogate/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[IDataContractSurrogate#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/idatacontractsurrogate/vb/source.vb#0)]

summary.span: 在架构导出操作期间，向架构中插入非 null 返回值的批注。

span.span: During schema export operations, inserts annotations into the schema for non-null return values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在简单实现中，请使用 if…then…else 控制结构测试 `obj` 值的类型是否为被代理的类型。In a simple implementation, use an if…then…else control structure to test whether the `obj` value is of the surrogated type. 如果是，则根据需要转换该值并返回被替换的对象。If so, transform it as necessary and return the substituted object. 被替换的对象可以是新实例或同一个 `obj` 实例。The substituted object can be a new instance or the same `obj` instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的实现。The following example shows an implementation of the method. span.span: Sets the collection of known types to use for serialization and deserialization of the custom data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在架构导出或架构导入过程中，仅当使用 方法将批注插入架构时，才需要使用此方法。This method is required during schema export or schema import only if annotations are inserted into the schema using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在表示架构类型的 CLR 类型，则应返回 `Null`。`Null` should be returned if a CLR type does not exist for representing the schema type. 这会导致在架构导入过程中生成一个新类型。This will cause a new type to be generated during schema import. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的实现。The following example shows an implementation of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可在此方法中修改输入 或 中的其他信息。The input or other information in the can be modified by the user in this method. 如果返回 `null`，它将导致不生成该类型。If `null` is returned, it will cause the type to not be generated. 如果返回一个新的 ，它将替换生成的原始类型。If a new is returned, it will replace the original type generated.
